experience.role: Lead Research Assistant - Adolescent Pedagogical Studies
experience.description: Conducted a comprehensive qualitative study on the impact of inquiry-based learning on high school student engagement in STEM subjects. Synthesized data from 50+ classroom observations to develop a white paper on effective formative assessment techniques.

Assisted in research focused on the efficacy of blended learning environments for secondary education. Developed pilot curriculum modules for high school biology based on current neuro-educational research, focusing on information retention and student autonomy.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
